attributes.action: Put Barnoldswick Earby Salterforth Kelbrook back craven
attributes.additional_details: In 1974 we did not get a vote on if we wanted to go into Lancashire out of Craven most of the people did not want to go in to Lancashire.Can we have a know.We always seem to be forgot about by Lancashire! roads repair griting in winter Pendle council don't care about the area.PLEASE give us a vote.
attributes.background: Put Barnoldswick Earby Salterforth Kelbrook back into craven with Skipton

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for Pendle and Craven Councils. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
